Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -160,9 +160,9 @@
 }
 
 .card-body {
   overflow-x: auto;    /* only scroll horizontally if needed */
-  overflow-y: visible; /* let details expand downward */
+  overflow-y: hidden; /* let details expand downward */
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -159,9 +159,9 @@
   min-height: 100%;    /* card grows with content */
 }
 
 .card-body {
-  overflow-x: auto;    /* only scroll horizontally if needed */
+  overflow-x: hidden;    /* only scroll horizontally if needed */
   overflow-y: hidden; /* let details expand downward */
 }
